resources.string:
Speeded up the app
 The interface has been redesigned a bit
 Added opening the menu by long pressing the info icon in recent calls
 Added ability to make an anonymous call (with prefix #31#)
 Added possibility to swap SIM cards in the dialer
 Added button vibration on the call screen and when the call status changes (disabled in the settings)
 Changed dialpad styles
 Added the ability to resize the call button
 Added the ability to make the top bar of the app colored
 Fixed text and avatar color on conference call screen
 Fixed an issue with starting a call from some third-party apps
 Fixed avatar colors in call history
 Fixed bugs, improved stability
